mapper.sql: cart_id, user_id, product_id, specification_value_id, amount ,create_time, paramete, canshu_value_id, activity_markers
mapper.select: select A.*,b.* from web_cart as A left join web_products as B on A.product_id=B.product_id where A.cart_id = #{cartId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and A.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select A.* from web_cart as A left join web_products as B on A.product_id=B.product_id where A.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and B.product_id is not null
mapper.insert: insert into web_cart (cart_id, user_id, product_id, specification_value_id, amount, create_time, canshu_value_id, parameter, activity_markers) values (#{cartId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specificationValueId, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{amount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paramete, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canshuValueId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityMarkers,jdbcType=INTEGER})
